configuration.packets

Class ConfigurationPacketReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • configuration.packets.ConfigurationPacketReceiver

  • public class ConfigurationPacketReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for deconstructing a packet (having the configuration described in the enum SPInstr) received from the client or the server.
    Author:
    Romain Mormont
    See Also:
    SPInstr, ConfigurationPacketSender

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigurationPacketReceiver(java.io.InputStream is)
      Deconstruct a packet received in the given input stream (reads it till an EOP byte is reached)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean actionIsClose()
      Returns true if the action requested was CLOSE
      boolean actionIsWaitAuthentication()
      Returns true if the action requested was WAIT_AUTH
      boolean actionIsWaitCmd()
      Returns true if the action requested was WAIT_CMD
      java.lang.String getCommand()
      Returns the command contained in the packet and its arguments
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      Returns the message contained in the packet
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Returns the password sent in the packet if all authentication data have been received.
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Returns the username sent in the packet if all authentication data have been received.
      boolean hasAuthentication()
      Returns true whether the packet contains authentication data (username AND password).
      boolean hasCommand()
      Returns true whether the packet contains a command
      boolean hasMessage()
      Returns true whether the packet contains a message

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • hasMessage

        public boolean hasMessage()
        Returns true whether the packet contains a message
        Returns:
        true if the packet contains a message, false otherwise

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Returns the message contained in the packet
        Returns:
        the message, null if there wasn't any

      • hasAuthentication

        public boolean hasAuthentication()
        Returns true whether the packet contains authentication data (username AND password).
        Returns:
        true if the packet contains authentication data, false otherwise

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Returns the username sent in the packet if all authentication data have been received. Otherwise, returns null if the packet didn't contain any authentication data or if one of them was missing
        Returns:
        the username or a null pointer

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        Returns the password sent in the packet if all authentication data have been received. Otherwise, returns null if the packet didn't contain any authentication data or if one of them was missing
        Returns:
        the password or a null pointer

      • hasCommand

        public boolean hasCommand()
        Returns true whether the packet contains a command
        Returns:
        true if the packet contains a command, false otherwise

      • getCommand

        public java.lang.String getCommand()
        Returns the command contained in the packet and its arguments
        Returns:
        the command and its arguments, null if the packet didn't contain any command

      • actionIsWaitCmd

        public boolean actionIsWaitCmd()
        Returns true if the action requested was WAIT_CMD
        Returns:
        true if the action is WAIT_CMD, false otherwise

        Returns:
        true if the action is WAIT_AUTH, false otherwise

        public boolean actionIsClose()
